安装¶

1 echo off
2 
3 ::32位机
4 systeminfo|findstr X86&&echo start to download python of 32bit...&&curl -o python-3.11.4.exe https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.11.4/python-3.11.4.exe&&echo successful,installing...&&python-3.11.4.exe&&exit /b 0
5 
6 ::64位机
7 systeminfo|findstr x64&&echo start to download python of 64bit...&&curl -o python-3.11.4-amd64.exe https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.11.4/python-3.11.4-amd64.exe&&echo successful,installing...&&python-3.11.4-amd64.exe&&exit /b 0

hello

def my_function():
    "just a test"
    print 8/2
../../../code/install.bat¶
